Title: S9:E6 - What is Java good for and why is it still one of the most popular coding languages (Peggy Fisher)
Description: GitHub cited Java as one of the most popular coding languages in 2018, and there is a reason why this language has stood the test of time. We chat with Peggy Fisher, content manager at Linkedin Learning Solutions, and author of the book Get Programming with Java, about why Java is still so popular, what it’s good for, and how to get started.
